titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4241) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 201(a) of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2006.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4241) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 201(a) of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2006.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-281, by Mr. Putnam.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4241 with 2 hours of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 115.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 558, H. Res. 542 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4241) to provide for reconciliation under the concurrent resolution on the budget for FY2006.
